description.en: Students practice in working environment where the knowledge and skills acquired during the studies at the university are essential. The problem situations in the working process will be analysed and the applied solving strategies evaluated with the supervisor from the university.
description.et: Doktorandid läbivad praktika töökohal, kus töötamiseks on vajalikud õpitaval erialal omandatud teadmised ja oskused. Ülikoolipoolse juhendajaga analüüsitakse praktikal lahendatud probleemsituatsioone ning antakse hinnang üliõpilase poolt leitud lahendusstrateegiatele.

objectives.en: The course is for practicing knowledge and skills acquired during the study at the university in working environment outside the university.
objectives.et: Kursus võimaldab õpitaval erialal omandatud teadmisi ja oskusi praktiseerida töökeskkonnas väljaspool ülikooli.

learning_outcomes.en: After successful completion of the practice the student:

learning_outcomes.et: 1. on omandanud erialase praktilise töö kogemuse;

learning_outcomes.en: 2. is able to work in a team;
3. is able to adapt to the daily work routines;
4. has an overview of a particular company, its operating environment, market potential, career opportunities in this business, as well as company-specific practical aspects of corporate governance;
learning_outcomes.et: 4. omab ülevaadet konkreetsest ettevõttest, selle töökeskkonnast, turupotentsiaalist, karjäärivõimalustest selles ettevõttes, konkreetse ettevõtte, aga ka ettevõtte juhtimise praktilistest külgedest üldiselt;

learning_outcomes.en: 5. is able to give a report about his activities in the company: problem setup, goals of the training, specific task of the trainee, the results of work;
learning_outcomes.et: 5. anda ülevaadet oma rollist antud ettevõttes: ülevaade probleemist, praktika eesmärgid, praktikandi spetsiifilised ülesanded, töötulemused;

learning_outcomes.en: 6. is able to analyze what it is in the university lessons learned from makes practical use to him/her, which has benefited and what would be necessary to modify or customize in the learning process;
learning_outcomes.et: 6. oskab analüüsida, mida ülikoolis õpitust on ta praktilisest tegevuses kasutanud, mis on tulnud kasuks ja mida oleks vajalik muuta või kohendada õppeprotsessis;

learning_outcomes.en: 7. is able to analyze how the company gained the experience and knowledge has furthered his education in the university;
learning_outcomes.et: 7. oskab analüüsida, kuidas ettevõttes omandatud kogemused ja teadmised on täiendanud tema ülikooliharidust;

learning_outcomes.en: 8. is able to do periodic self-reflection of how the objectives set have been completed and is able to set new goals for the next reflection period.
learning_outcomes.et: 8. oskab teha perioodilisi enesereflektsioone, kuidas seatud eesmärgid on täitunud ja oskab seada eesmärke uueks reflektsiooniperioodiks.

independent_work.et: According to topic of practical work

description.et: Report of practical work has been presented

grade_preconditions.et: Practical work has been performed and report presented to programme manager

grade_evaluation.et: Practical work has been performed and report presented to programme manager
